devdoc.details: Handles yield routing for early rent payments                           NOMA VAULT                                                                                                                          DEPOSIT      YIELD POOL    DISTRIBUTE              (USDC)                                                                                                                                                                                                                     Tenant           AI Routing         Landlord               Balance          (Mock MVP)         Balance

AddressEmptyCode(address).details: There's no code at `target` (it is not a contract).

AddressInsufficientBalance(address).details: The ETH balance of the account is not enough to perform the operation.

FailedInnerCall().details: A call to an address target failed. The target may have reverted.

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC20 token failed.

params.leaseId: The lease to accrue yield for

params.isEarly: Whether this is an early payment
params.leaseId: The lease ID for the payment

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._yieldBps: New yield rate in basis points

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateYieldStrategy(string).details: In production, this would integrate with actual DeFi protocols

devdoc.title: NomaVault

AIAgentTrigger(string,uint256,bytes).notice: Emitted for AI agent trigger points

LeaseCreated(uint256,address,address,uin.notice: Emitted when a new lease is created

PaymentSettled(uint256,uint256,uint256,s.notice: Emitted when payment is settled on Arc

claimableYield(address).notice: Mapping of address to claimable yield

constructor.notice: Initialize the vault with USDC address

earlyPaymentYieldBps().notice: Yield rate for early payments (basis points, e.g., 50 = 0.5%)

estimateYield(uint256,uint256).notice: Get estimated yield for an amount

leaseDeposits(uint256).notice: Mapping of lease ID to deposited amount

leaseYield(uint256).notice: Mapping of lease ID to yield earned

mockAPY().notice: Mock APY for demo (in basis points, 500 = 5%)

updateYieldStrategy(string).notice: Update yield strategy (AI agent would call this)

userdoc.notice: Vault for USDC deposits, yield generation, and fund management
